instruction: Generate an article summarizing the Biden-Harris 2020 US Presidential election campaign.
output: Former Vice President Joe Biden and Senator Kamala Harris launched their 2020 US Presidential campaign in April 2019. The Biden-Harris campaign focused on issues of health care, economic fairness, climate change, racial justice, foreign policy, and other topics. Biden and Harris criss-crossed the country in an effort to make their case directly to voters and to build a broad, diverse coalition. They also made use of digital campaigns in order to reach a wider audience. Their strong message about “restoring the soul of America” resonated with voters and ultimately Biden and Harris were successful in defeating the incumbent president in a historic election.
